message.invasionmod.nexus_status: Nexus %s | Health: %s/%s | %s | Radius: %s blocks | Wave: %s | Remaining: %s (Active %s) | Next wave in: %s ticks
message.invasionmod.nexus_activation_inv: The Nexus hums as an invasion begins!
message.invasionmod.nexus_activation_str: A powerful invasion is on its way!
message.invasionmod.nexus_activation_sta: The Nexus stabilizes and enters continuous mode.
message.invasionmod.nexus_debug.mobs: Remaining mobs: %s | Active: %s | Pending spawns: %s | Cooldown: %s ticks
message.invasionmod.nexus_debug.power: Power level: %s (timer %s) | Wave active: %s | Damping: %s | Strong damping: %s
message.invasionmod.debug_wand.idle: No Nexus bound. Right-click a Nexus to link.
message.invasionmod.debug_wand.tame: The wolf now answers your call.
message.invasionmod.nexus_wave_cleared: Wave %s cleared. Next wave in %s ticks (%s seconds).
commands.invasionmod.invasion.no_focus: No focused Nexus. Right-click a Nexus to link invasion commands.
commands.invasionmod.invasion.help.2: /invasion begin [wave] - Start an invasion at the focused Nexus.
commands.invasionmod.invasion.help.3: /invasion continuous [wave] - Enter continuous mode from the focused Nexus.
commands.invasionmod.invasion.help.4: /invasion end - Stop the current invasion immediately.
commands.invasionmod.invasion.help.5: /invasion range <radius> - Set spawn radius while the Nexus is dormant.
commands.invasionmod.invasion.help.6: /invasion status - Print a detailed Nexus status report.
commands.invasionmod.invasion.help.7: /invasion spawnertest [start] [end] - Log wave diagnostics to the server console.
commands.invasionmod.invasion.begin.fail: Unable to start the invasion. Check the Nexus state.
commands.invasionmod.invasion.range.acti: Cannot change the spawn radius while the Nexus is active.
commands.invasionmod.invasion.range.succ: Nexus spawn radius set to %s blocks.
commands.invasionmod.invasion.status: Sent Nexus status information to your chat.
commands.invasionmod.invasion.test.spawn: Running spawner diagnostics for waves %s-%s (continuous: %s). Check the server log.
commands.invasionmod.invasion.test.waveb: Running wave builder diagnostics (difficulty %s, tier %s, length %s seconds). Check the server log.
commands.invasionmod.invasion.test.point: Sampling %s spawn points at radius %s. Check the server log.
message.invasionmod.strange_bone.no_nexu: A nearby Nexus is required to transform this wolf.
message.invasionmod.strange_bone.success: The wolf resonates with the Nexus and transforms!
